scripts.test:apis:all: npm run test:apis:property-resolution && npm run test:apis:reservations && npm run test:apis:toxicity
scripts.test:apis:property-resolution: cd tests/bruno/booking_mock_apis && bru run PropertyResolution/Basic_Flow --env PropertyResolution --delay 200 && bru run PropertyResolution/Error_Flow --env PropertyResolution --delay 200 && bru run PropertyResolution/Location_Flow --env PropertyResolution --delay 200
scripts.test:apis:reservations: cd tests/bruno/booking_mock_apis && bru run Reservations/Setup --env Reservations --delay 1000 && bru run Reservations/SF_Flow --env Reservations --delay 2000 && bru run Reservations/NY_Flow --env Reservations --delay 2000 && bru run Reservations/Filter_Flow --env Reservations --delay 2000 && bru run Reservations/Error_Flow --env Reservations --delay 2000
scripts.test:apis:toxicity: cd tests/bruno/booking_mock_apis && bru run ToxicityDetection/Basic_Flow --env ToxicityDetection --delay 200 && bru run ToxicityDetection/Edge_Cases --env ToxicityDetection --delay 200 && bru run ToxicityDetection/Error_Flow --env ToxicityDetection --delay 200
